slide_1.text: Do you have a business idea, but don't know how to implement it? Do you lack tools or is the fear of failure stopping you?

slide_2.text_1: a business incubator that will become the backbone of your business!
slide_2.text_2: We help to conduct legal business without registration of a legal entity in Poland and mandatory contributions to ZUS.

slide_3.text_1: Decided to change the business incubator? The first month of service in the Freedom Business Area is free.

title: Foundation
text_1: The Freedom Business Area Foundation sees its mission as helping: Digital, IT professionals and freelancers from all over the world run virtual businesses in Poland. The FBA Foundation provides a unique opportunity to test your business ideas in the marketplace.
